BackstoryDef.title: introvert
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wouldn’t even utter a word to [PAWN_possessive] own parents until the age of six; [PAWN_pronoun] was so shy and introverted that anyone who could coax a word out of [PAWN_objective] was considered to be very special.

BackstoryDef.title: urban faun
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of an urban life, and set out to live within a sprawling, human civilisation. [PAWN_pronoun] rummaged through dustbins and ate leftovers to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: unlikely bandit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was saved from drowning by a group of notorious bandits. Even they didn’t have the heart to neglect this adorable, young faun, and so raised [PAWN_objective] as their own. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to appreciate [PAWN_possessive] saviours' dastardly cause.

BackstoryDef.title: saint
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following a tragic wildfire, [PAWN_nameDef] scrambled to save the injured wildlife that lie in its wake. [PAWN_possessive] bravery resulted in [PAWN_objective] becoming a figure of peace. [PAWN_pronoun] was worshipped as a saint by the pacifist settlers of the forest, who offered gifts to [PAWN_objective] in exchange for [PAWN_possessive] blessings and guidance.

BackstoryDef.title: osteologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s unique admiration for the skeletal form lead [PAWN_objective] to become an osteologist. \n\nA mere pile of bones was enough for anatomical prodigy [PAWN_nameDef] to give a detailed profile on the diet, age and health of their owners.

BackstoryDef.title: child psychologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the field of child psychology and conducted behavioural tests on willing participants to determine what makes children so unique. While [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed [PAWN_possessive] work, [PAWN_pronoun] always detested having to be around children off the clock.

BackstoryDef.title: melittologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sweeter than honey [PAWN_nameDef] had a penchant for bees, and worked as a melittologist. [PAWN_nameDef] began by studying bees in their natural habitats, eventually constructing [PAWN_possessive] own outdoor testing facility, which [PAWN_pronoun] dubbed the “laborapiary”.

BackstoryDef.title: charitable
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] siblings established a makeshift shelter for children of war. What [PAWN_pronoun] lacked domestic skills, [PAWN_pronoun] made up for in creative ones, and [PAWN_pronoun] would sing to the orphans every night. Songs of love, songs of compassion and songs of new beginnings.
